info.description: A REST-Full API called that provides booking services. It gives users the ablity to own workspaces where they can show case their business as well as make appointments to existing workspaces.
info.title: BOOKER API

tags.name: Account
tags.description: Handles the create, the activation, and management of an account.

tags.name: Profile
tags.description: Interactes with users profile, manages it.

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description: Handles appointments managment. Creation, update, and canceling an appointment.

tags.name: Workspace
tags.description: Handles workspaces managment. Where a workspace can be set.

tags.name: Review
tags.description: Handles users reviews in a specific workspace. Including likes, dislikes, and comments.

tags.name: Reclaim
tags.description: Handles users reclaims that can be resolved by the administration.

tags.name: Payment
tags.description: Handles users payment for their subscription.

post.description: An end point that registers a new user

put.description: An end point that verifies a user using a token that was send by email.

post.description: An end point that send a temprary password in case the user has fogoten the password and requested one.
An end point that creates a session for a user.

delete.description: An end point that deletes the user's session.
An end point that removes a user's account permanently.

post.description: An end point that upgrades a user from being reqular to having a premium account.

get.description: An end point that gets the user's profile

put.description: An end point that updates the user's profile

get.description: An end point that gets the user's profile by the identifier.
An end point that gets all appointments created by the user.
An end point that gets a single appointment created by the user by the identifier.

put.description: An end point that updates the user's appointment with the specified identifier.
An end point that cancels the user's appointment with given identifier.

post.description: An end point that creates an appointment for a specific workspace.

get.description: An end point that gets all the reclaims done by the user.

post.description: An end point that creates a reclaim for the user.
An end point that creates a review on a specific workspace.

put.description: An end point that updates a review by the identifier.

delete.description: An end point that deletes a review by the identifier.

post.description: An end point that adds a like to a review by the identifier.
An end point that adds a dislike to a review by the identifier.

get.description: An end point that gets all the workspaces available.

post.description: An end point that creates a workspaces for a premium account.

get.description: An end point that gets a workspaces by the identifier.

put.description: An end point that updates a workspaces by the identifier.

delete.description: An end point that deletes a workspaces by the identifier.

get.description: An end point that gets all the appointments of a workspace by the identifier.
An end point that gets a single appointment of a workspace by the identifier.

put.description: An end point that verifies the workspace's appointment with the identifier.
An end point that marks the workspace's appointment with the identifier as attended.
An end point that marks the workspace's appointment with the identifier as canceled.

post.description: An end point that registers a new payment

get.description: An end point that lists all the payments done by a user.
An end point that registers a new payment
An end point that generates an invoice for all the payments done by the user.
